text: The Fresh Air Cure is a 1914 American silent film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Vincente DePascale - Tony Stilletto * Eva Bell - Anna Stilletto * Oliver Hardy - Morris Silverstein (as Babe Hardy) * Bert Tracy - Izzy Silverstein (as Herbert Tracy) * Royal Byron - Mr. Strong * Billy Bowers - Pat McFlarrathy ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==References== ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Fresh Air Cure
